about_the_game:
Discover a heartwarming new dimension in The Tenants with the Pets DLC. From dogs and cats to raccoons, mini pigs, parrots, fish, hamsters, bunnies, frogs, and turtles, welcome a diverse array of adorable creatures into your rental empire. Build a relationship with your tenants and their pets, and watch your rental business flourish as you create pet-friendly homes for a wide variety of furry and feathered friends.



Transform the lives of Wondersville's stray pets by restoring an old animal shelter. Find new loving homes by renting apartments to pet owners, and keep both tenants and their pets happy to maximize your profits. Interact with the pets, play with them, and give them treats to strengthen your bond with your tenants and their cute pals.



Upgrade your rental properties with over 500 new pet-friendly items and furniture pieces. Customize each apartment to accommodate your tenants' pets and make it feel like a true home. Complete 4 new Elite Contracts and showcase your expertise in creating the perfect living spaces for pet owners and their beloved companions.

Experience the joy of bringing people and pets together in this delightful expansion for The Tenants. Build your property empire with a pet-friendly approach and watch your business thrive as you cater to animal lovers in Wondersville!

The DLC will include:
  • Dynamic pets:
  • Dogs (5 small and 5 large breeds),
  • Cats (10 breeds),
  • Parrots,
  • Raccoons,
  • Mini pigs.
  • Static pets:
  • Fish,
  • Hamsters,
  • Bunnies,
  • Frogs,
  • Turtles.
  • Upgradable pet shelter
  • Stray pets
  • 4 new elite contracts
  • New gifts, services, and sabotage options related to pets
  • New pets related furniture
  • New pets related events
  • New phone app for pet management
  • A new special mission dubbed "parrot collector" with a special secret prize

name: The Tenants - Pets DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 / Phenom x4 955
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / AMD R7-260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Experience the joy of bringing people and pets together in this delightful expansion for The Tenants. Build your property empire with a pet-friendly approach, and watch your business thrive as you satisfy animal lovers in Wondersville!
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Turkish, Hungarian, Korean, Romanian, Traditional Chinese, Danish, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Czech
*languages with full audio support
